com.msgilligan.bitcoinj.cli

Class CliCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.msgilligan.bitcoinj.cli.CliCommand
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BitcoinJCli, GetBlockCount, Status

    public abstract class CliCommand
extends Object

    Base class for CLI commands that use Bitcoin RPC
